body.p: To all those whose signatures are attached to the Round Robin from Tottenham of Monday’s dateA letter of appreciation, dated 29 November, the signatures set out in a circle, a device originally intended to avoid any one signatory being identified as chief instigator in letters of complaint. Presumably a response to the completion of Barnaby Rudge in Master Humphrey’s Clock (27 Nov) and CD’s farewell to his readers for twelve months. I send my hearty thanks for their communication and cordially respond to all their good wishes and kind expressions.
